name: G-BOT
description:
G-Bot is a platforming game made using Unity 2D, which instead of using basic jump mechanics, uses gravity inversion to play through the levels.

The game was made for a game jam held in my school, where I showcased this game and won third prize for it. 

Currently, I have no future plans for it as it is a prototype and I can come back to this game once I am more experienced and have a better understanding of the Unity Engine and its features.

PS: This was my first game :P
